Player History
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (N) on 2/16/2014 to a 2-year deal worth $3,170,000 per year...
Was claimed off waivers by Philadelphia on 6/3/2014.
Traded from Philadelphia to Cleveland on 2/2/2015 (Going to CLE: P James McDonald, P Brody Colvin, P Jose Gonzalez. Going to PHI: P Dace Kime)...
Earned first career win on 4/12/2015...
Injured on 8/2/2016 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 5 weeks...
Traded from Cleveland to Kansas City on 1/31/2017 (Going to CLE: SS Orlando Calixte, 3B Cheslor Cuthbert, 1B Eric Hosmer. Going to KC: 1B Xavier Scruggs, P Jose Gonzalez)...
2/2/2019: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,445,714 through salary arbitration...
1/31/2020: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,445,714 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 3/30/2020 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
1/31/2021: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,445,714 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Kansas City to New York (N) on 3/2/2021 (Going to NYM: P Jose Gonzalez. Going to KC: 1B Akira Hiroki, P Akeem Bostick)...
Traded from New York (N) to Chicago (N) on 6/20/2021 (Going to CHC: P Jose Gonzalez. Going to NYM: P Steven Routh, P Terry Murff, P Nathaniel Banks)...
8/9/2021: Signed a contract extension with Chicago (N), $15,000,000 per year, for 2 years.
Had first career hit on 8/17/2021, off Tony Cingrani (HOU)...
10/24/2023: Signed a contract extension with Chicago (N), $2,640,000 per year, for 2 years.
Signed as a free agent by Arizona on 2/2/2024 to a 3-year deal worth $6,480,000 per year...
Traded from Arizona to Chicago (N) on 2/15/2024 (Going to CHC: P Jose Gonzalez. Going to ARI: 2B Stephen Spangler)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/19/2024, off James Gilley (WAS)...
10/29/2025: Signed a contract extension with Chicago (N), $18,910,000 per year, for 1 years.
